givenName.title: Given Name
givenName.description: The person's given name as it appears on official identity documents.

familyName.title: Family Name
familyName.description: The person's family name as it appears on official identity documents.

bodyType.title: Vehicle Body Type
bodyType.description: The type of the vehicle's body, e.g., Sedan, SUV, Truck.

fuelType.title: Fuel Type
fuelType.description: The fuel type the vehicle uses, e.g., Petrol, Diesel, Electric.

seatingCapacity.title: Seating Capacity
seatingCapacity.description: The number of seats available in the vehicle.
